nodes.bodyText: @hamiltonha Do we have guidance on including pointers to docs URLs in error messages? Do we need to create a go.microsoft or aka.ms URL for it?
@iambmelt we need to create FWLinks, for future reference: https://review.docs.microsoft.com/en-us/help/contribute/contribute-link-to-articles-from-the-user-interface?branch=master
Can this whole thing just be a static constant?
Also, using concatenation is far more efficient than String.format, which we should probably avoid whenever feasible.
